newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portuguese shares end firmer, BPSM hits new highs.
newsitem.headline: Portuguese shares end firmer, BPSM hits new highs.

text.p: Portuguese shares ended higher, even though a major national fund appeared at midsession with heavy sales orders. Liquidity in the cash market stood at 25.44 billion escudos after a session marked by new highs for Banco Pinto e Sotto Mayor, pulp group Portucel, Portugal Telecom and cement group Semapa, among others. The Lisbon market was indifferent to the mixed tone in Europe, the Independence Day holiday in the U.S. and the government's threat to resign over opposition local government spending proposals.
